message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll offer you a slightly better deal than last round.  How about this? We can both still get a good amount, and avoid any further inflation.
I'm not worried about inflation, I think I can get a better deal.
Look, Bob, inflation is hurting me more than you. Let's just split this evenly and call it a day. I'm not sure how much longer I can keep playing this game.
I know inflation is hurting you, but I'm not going to give up my advantage now.
